title: Engineering Education Research Theory Application and Assessment Competency Strengthening Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational engineering education theories and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Work-integrated learning for professionals, utilizing mobile learning environments via smartphones.

learning_goals: Analyze trends in engineering education research by applying systematic literature review (SLR) methodology.
Understand and apply the fundamental principles of the FIETS framework for evaluating the level of educational theory application.
Write a report systematically evaluating the extent of theory utilization in the design and analysis of engineering education interventions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
